faq_answers.title: FAQ Answers
faq_answers.desc: Answers to the most frequently asked questions about {{themeName}} theme and its features

animated_images.title: Animated Images Element (Malak)
animated_images.desc: The animated images element (Malak) can be used to add (static banner - animated banners - auto-play video). The element also contains a set of new options such as adding banners with custom size for mobile devices, adding animation effects to banner elements and the freedom to choose banner size without cropping parts of it.

square_images.title: Square Images Element (Malak)
square_images.desc: The square images element (Malak) is used to add any number of images or banners with full control over dividing them according to the number of columns for both mobile and computer separately. You can also switch between slider mode (images in one moving row) and grid mode (images under each other in more than one row) to get a consistent look. Each image is also linked with a special link or linked with the window element (Malak).

store_features.title: Store Features Element (Malak)
store_features.desc: Highlight your store's features professionally and add unlimited features with the ability to change the feature icon to any other icon or image. You can also activate the ascending number counter to add effects to store statistics. The element also fully supports the Lordicon.com icon library which contains more than 17 thousand customizable animated icons.

quick_links.title: Quick Links Element (Malak)
quick_links.desc: Add quick links with an icon or thumbnail for each link. You can combine this element with the animated images element (Malak) to appear distinctive and elegant.

featured_product.title: Featured Product Element (Malak)
featured_product.desc: Highlight your best-selling product with this new element, add an image of the product or offer and control the element's distinctive options (titles - product features - discount counter) and add a button with any link you want to direct the visitor to.

separator.title: Separator Element (Malak)
separator.desc: You can combine any two homepage elements using the separator element (Malak) and get an element with a new and distinctive design. The separator element (Malak) is also used as a title for any element that follows it with the ability to add an icon, link and discount counter.

modal_window.title: Modal Window Element (Malak)
modal_window.desc: Link images and banners to a popup window full of elements instead of using a link to another page. You can link Malak window with square images element (Malak) only instead of a link, and it also contains many features such as adding images, animation, controlling design and colors and others.

faq.title: FAQ Element (Malak)
faq.desc: Share with your store visitors answers to the most frequently asked questions from customers about the store, products, ordering method or others. You can add a brief answer with a link to an introductory page or a button for direct communication.

animated_articles.title: Animated Articles Element (Malak)
animated_articles.desc: You can use the animated articles element (Malak) to display blog article links in an attractive and elegant way, and you can also use it for any other purpose as you wish. Add an image with a title and subtitle then add a button to direct the customer to the required page.

customer_reviews.title: Customer Reviews Element (Malak)
customer_reviews.desc: A space to display customer reviews manually instead of Salla's automatic reviews. Through this element you can control the details of each review (image - city - number of stars - review text). You can also attach an image or short video with each review.

store_locations.title: Store Locations Element (Malak)
store_locations.desc: Make it easy for your customer to reach your site by adding branch locations on Google Maps in the main store interface.

store_stories.title: Store Stories Element (Malak)
store_stories.desc: Instagram stories with the same distinctive design can now be added to your store and share with your visitors the most important moments and offers.

brand_showcase.title: Brand Showcase Element
brand_showcase.desc: Display your global product brands automatically through the brand showcase element. Choose the brands to be displayed then save and they will be displayed directly.

privacy_policy.introduction: Welcome to our pet supplies store. We are committed to protecting your privacy while you shop for pet food, grooming tools, toys, accessories, litter, carriers and related products, and to providing a safe experience that complies with the regulations of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, including the E-commerce Law and the Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL).

definitions.agency_text: The pet supplies store, including the website and all its services and pet products.
definitions.user_text: Any natural or legal person who uses the website to browse or purchase pet supplies, accessories, and related products.
definitions.personal_data_text: Information that identifies the user such as name, mobile number, email.

agreement.point1: By using the website or purchasing through it, you acknowledge your full agreement to this policy.
agreement.point2: If you do not agree to any part of these terms, please do not use the website.

data_collection.subtitle: We collect the following data:
data_collection.technical_info: IP address, browser type and device

data_usage.subtitle: We use this data for:
data_usage.communication: Communicating with you about order and shipping status
data_usage.improve_experience: Improving shopping experience and offering tailored pet care recommendations

privacy_policy.data_protection_note: We do not collect unnecessary data or data unrelated to the service, and we do not share your data with any third party for marketing purposes without your explicit consent.

data_sharing.subtitle: Your data is shared only with the following parties:
data_sharing.payment_providers_text: Such as Visa, Mada, Apple Pay, Tamara and trusted shipping companies
data_sharing.authorities_text: In case of a binding legal request

data_protection.no_disclosure: We are committed to not disclosing user data to any unauthorized party
data_protection.access_control: We limit access to data within the system according to strict internal controls

user_rights.subtitle: According to the Personal Data Protection Law, you have the right to:
user_rights.correct_delete: Request correction or deletion of your data
user_rights.object_marketing: Object to the use of your data in advertisements or offers
user_rights.file_complaint: File a complaint with the competent authorities (such as the Saudi Data Authority - SDAIA)
user_rights.contact_note: To request any of the above, please contact us via:

terms_of_use.age_requirement: The user must be 18 years or older
terms_of_use.account_responsibility: The user is responsible for using their account and maintaining their login data
terms_of_use.legal_use: Using the website for any illegal purpose or contrary to public morals is prohibited
terms_of_use.account_suspension: The store reserves the right to suspend or cancel violating accounts without notice

intellectual_property.ownership: All content displayed on the website (brand names, images, product descriptions, and pet care content) is owned by the store
intellectual_property.usage_prohibition: Using or redistributing any of this content without prior written permission is prohibited

policy_updates.modification_right: The store reserves the right to modify or update this policy at any time
policy_updates.notification: Any changes will be published on this page, and continued use of the website after modification is considered implicit consent

applicable_law.content: This policy is subject to the laws and regulations of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and any dispute related to it shall be under the jurisdiction of the competent judicial authorities in the Kingdom.

contact.subtitle: For any inquiries regarding this policy, please contact via:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We're here to support you! Contact us for any inquiries about our products or to get help.

terms_and_conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_and_conditions.introduction: Welcome to our perfume store. By using our website or purchasing fragrances, essential oils, and complementary products, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. Please read these terms carefully before using our services and products.

definitions.title: First: Definitions
definitions.agency_text: The website, its services, and all fragrance-related products.
definitions.user_text: Any natural or legal person who uses the website to browse or purchase fragrances and complementary products.
definitions.products_text: Fragrances, essential oils, scented candles, and related products offered through the site.

agreement.title: Second: Agreement to Terms
agreement.point1: By using the site or purchasing through it, you acknowledge your complete agreement to these terms and conditions.
agreement.point2: If you do not agree to any part of these terms, please do not use the site or its products.

user_responsibilities.title: Third: User Responsibilities
user_responsibilities.point1: The user must be 18 years old or older.
user_responsibilities.point2: The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account data.
user_responsibilities.point3: Using the site for illegal purposes or violating public morals is prohibited.
user_responsibilities.point4: The user must provide accurate and updated information when registering or purchasing.

payment_terms.title: Fourth: Payment Terms
payment_terms.point1: Payments are processed through secure gateways such as Mada, Visa, Apple Pay, and Tamara.
payment_terms.point2: All prices include applicable taxes under the regulations of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
payment_terms.point3: Additional fees may be imposed by banks or payment providers, and the store is not responsible for them.

cancellation_refunds.title: Fifth: Cancellation and Refunds
cancellation_refunds.point1: Perfume and personal care products are non-returnable once opened or if seals are broken, for hygiene and safety reasons.
cancellation_refunds.point2: Order cancellation can be requested before shipment or within 24 hours of placing the order via the channels shown on the Contact page.
cancellation_refunds.point3: Returns or exchanges are accepted within 7 days of delivery for unopened products in their original condition with the invoice.

intellectual_property.title: Sixth: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.point1: All content displayed on the website (brand names, images, fragrance descriptions) is owned by the store.
intellectual_property.point2: Using or redistributing any of this content without prior written permission from the store is prohibited.

limitation_liability.title: Seventh: Limitation of Liability
limitation_liability.point1: The store is not responsible for any allergic reactions to products; please review ingredients before use.
limitation_liability.point2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate services or orders that violate policies without prior notice.
limitation_liability.point3: The user is responsible for ensuring product suitability for their needs before purchase.

modifications.title: Eighth: Modifications to Terms
modifications.point1: The store reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time.
modifications.point2: Any changes will be published on this page, and continued use of the site is considered implicit agreement to the modifications.

applicable_law.title: Ninth: Applicable Law
applicable_law.text: These terms and conditions are subject to the regulations and laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and any dispute related to them shall be under the jurisdiction of the competent judicial authorities in the Kingdom.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For any inquiries regarding these terms and conditions, please contact via the channels listed on the Contact Us page:
